descriptionNullable:
##This dataset offers a collection of anime  from the  [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/topanime.php)  database.


# Content

**Anime Name**: Title of the anime.
**Type**: Classification of anime (e.g., TV, Movie, OVA).
**Episodes**: Number of episodes.
**Status**: Broadcast status (e.g., Finished Airing).
**Aired**: Original airing dates.
**Premiered**: Season and year of premiere.
**Broadcast**: Weekly broadcast time.
**Producers**: Companies involved in production.
**Licensors**: Companies responsible for licensing the anime in different regions.
**Studios**: Studios that animated the series.
**Source**: Original source material (e.g., Manga, Light novel).
**Genres**: Categories describing the show (e.g., Action, Drama).
**Duration**: Length of each episode.
**Rating**: Audience suitability rating.
**Score**: Average rating given by MyAnimeList users.
**Ranked**: Ranking on MyAnimeList.
**Popularity**: Popularity rank on MyAnimeList.
**Favorites**: Number of times favorited by users.


# **Potential Uses:**
This dataset can be employed to develop recommendation engines, perform content analysis, or visualize trends in anime production and reception over the years.
title: Top Ranked Anime Dataset 2024
subtitle: MyAnimeList Top Anime
description:
##This dataset offers a collection of anime  from the  [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/topanime.php)  database.


# Content

**Anime Name**: Title of the anime.
**Type**: Classification of anime (e.g., TV, Movie, OVA).
**Episodes**: Number of episodes.
**Status**: Broadcast status (e.g., Finished Airing).
**Aired**: Original airing dates.
**Premiered**: Season and year of premiere.
**Broadcast**: Weekly broadcast time.
**Producers**: Companies involved in production.
**Licensors**: Companies responsible for licensing the anime in different regions.
**Studios**: Studios that animated the series.
**Source**: Original source material (e.g., Manga, Light novel).
**Genres**: Categories describing the show (e.g., Action, Drama).
**Duration**: Length of each episode.
**Rating**: Audience suitability rating.
**Score**: Average rating given by MyAnimeList users.
**Ranked**: Ranking on MyAnimeList.
**Popularity**: Popularity rank on MyAnimeList.
**Favorites**: Number of times favorited by users.


# **Potential Uses:**
This dataset can be employed to develop recommendation engines, perform content analysis, or visualize trends in anime production and reception over the years.
